data.text: @NonymousTeacher @TigressEllie @_f4vl @EnemyInAState @SafeEdForAll_UK Any info is good info even if I don’t list it , I can still log it
@DmodosCutter @TigressEllie @_f4vl @EnemyInAState @SafeEdForAll_UK I can send you details, but no formal letters from school sadly
@NonymousTeacher @TigressEllie @_f4vl @EnemyInAState @SafeEdForAll_UK Please read the comments on this thread ,

@DmodosCutter @TigressEllie @_f4vl @EnemyInAState @SafeEdForAll_UK Problem is schools are no longer informing parents. We have over thirty pupils and half the staff off with it currently, or worse, why the same symptoms but testing negative on LFT and therefore still in school very ill spreading it. Many pupils last had it in December...
@andshoal @TigressEllie @_f4vl @EnemyInAState @SafeEdForAll_UK That is why I keep my clinically vulnerable child home . I wouldn’t trust him in his dealings with anything .

@DmodosCutter @TigressEllie @_f4vl @EnemyInAState @SafeEdForAll_UK a cow dont get enough brain to think, ...or responsibility or moral, but he is on top of the power and no one jet takes the balls to put him out,...

@SayItAs81048082 @DmodosCutter @TigressEllie @_f4vl @EnemyInAState @SafeEdForAll_UK @BorisJohnson @nadhimzahawi I feel for you & this deliberately ineffective govt. I have never felt such disgust & loathing at any time in my politically aware adult life, & I hated thatcher.
